title: GlowSerum Ultra - Product Guide
description: A high-potency vitamin C serum for radiant skin.

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content: Promotes radiant and glowing skin. Addresses dullness and uneven tone. Provides essential hydration.

blocks.title: Safety Summary
blocks.content: Dermatologically recommended safety practices should be followed during application. Warnings: Avoid contact with eyes. Patch test before initial use.
